column4: ok - with 1173 people here - maybe someone knows how to configure ubuntu fiesty to play off the rack DVDs - I've tried everything in the readme files, I've gone though all of the ubuntu forums and installed X, Y and Z - but MoviePlayer still puts up the less than helpful dialog - "Totem cannot play this type of media (DVD) because you do not have the appropriate plugins to handle it.".  Is there anyone out there who can help?
you also have to donload appropriate gstreamer plugins
